title: Danny & Malcolm Gladwell (Author/Host of Revisionist History)
itunes:title: Danny & Malcolm Gladwell (Author/Host of Revisionist History)
description:
Danny chats with bestselling author and host Malcolm Gladwell about his new season of Revisionist History, why there will never be another Will & Grace, and SO much more!


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember
